hasAttributes.name: LeaseholdImprovementTypeId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Leasehold Improvement Type.

hasAttributes.name: LeaseholdImprovementTypeName
hasAttributes.description: The name of a Leasehold Improvement Type.

hasAttributes.name: LeaseholdImprovementTypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: The description of a Leasehold Improvement Type.

definitions.description:
A categorization of Leasehold Improvements based upon common characteristics of improvements.

Examples:

-  Plumbing
-  Lighting
-  Exterior
-  Interior
-  Structural
-  Roofing
